name: readCsvFileSync
value:
<T extends CsvItemType>(
  filePath: Path
): T[] | null => {
  // TODO: is this needed?
  if (!fs.existsSync(filePath)) return null;

  const readable = canReadSync(filePath);
  if (!readable) return null;
  const fileString = fs.readFileSync(filePath, "utf8");
  if (!fileString) return null;
  const parsed = tryParseCsv<T>(fileString);
  return parsed;
}
description:
Reads and parses CSV file

specify a generic of what type of item the file contains an array of
